page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: Nearly all the children from this area will go to Lipson Comprehensive School for their secondary education. This school opened in September 1984, and the local Secondary Modern schools are being closed in July 1985, when all their pupils will transfer to the new school. Children can still enter the selection test for Grammar Schools at age 11, but most people who were asked locally think the Grammar Schools should close. Most people think that the Efford Secondary Modern School will be knocked down and the land sold for housing. Some people say that the building should be saved and used as a Community Centre. It was opened in 1952.
